name: MeloBirdie
description:
Did you know that ducks could only memorize on SINGLE melody ? 

Plug your best MIDI Keyboard (May not work)  or play with your PC Keyboard and play melodies to save Birdie from the horrible forghates and wait for its mummy !

Play your special song to summon your family !

This game has been made in 12 hours during the Global Game Jam 2023. The theme was "Root". Enjoy !
